LanguageData.AteTiberiumMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate tiberium meat
LanguageData.AteTiberiumMeatDirect.stages.0.descripti: I ate some glowing, green crunchy meat. I feel sick.
LanguageData.AteTiberiumMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.des: I ate a meal cooked from glowing, crunchy meat. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but there were spikey pieces and a burning sensation is covering my tongue. I think I'm dying.
